title: You win Crossword Clue - Try Hard Guides
text: We have the answer for You win crossword clue in case youâ€™ve been struggling to solve this one! The puzzle is known for its contemporary and pop culture references, as well as its accessibility to solvers of all skill levels. The USA Today Crossword was first introduced in 2002, and has since become a popular source of entertainment and mental stimulation for crossword enthusiasts of all ages. author: andres-alejandro
title: Detienen a dos sujetos que se hacÃ­an pasar por funcionarios municipales en Guayaquil | Comunidad | Guayaquil | El Universo
text: Dos sujetos que se hacÃ­an pasar por funcionarios municipales para extorsionar a propietarios de locales comerciales fueron sorprendidos en flagrancia este jueves, 28 de diciembre de 2023, informa el Municipio de Guayaquil. Se detalla que los individuos fueron detenidos cuando timaban a un comerciante en ColÃ³n y PÃ­o Montufar, en el centro de la ciudad. Estas personas utilizaban credenciales que no corresponden a las emitidas en la actual administraciÃ³n municipal, ni forman parte de la nÃ³mina del cabildo. Los sospechosos fueron puestos a Ã³rdenes de las autoridades competentes para que se lleve a cabo la audiencia de formulaciÃ³n de cargos. Publicidad El cabildo porteÃ±o indica que â€œlos servidores y funcionarios pÃºblicos de esta Municipalidad deben actuar con base en derecho y valores, estÃ¡ prohibido cometer actos ilÃ­citos y hacer mal uso de los cargos que ocupan, de los uniformes o credenciales otorgadas para el ejercicio de sus funcionesâ€. A su vez, hace un llamado a la ciudadanÃ­a para que denuncie cualquier acto de corrupciÃ³n e irregularidades que atenten contra la ciudad. (I) Informamos a la ciudadanÃ­a que hoy fueron sorprendidos en flagrancia dos sujetos quienes se hacÃ­an pasar por funcionarios municipales para extorsionar a propietarios de locales comerciales.â€” Muy Ilustre Municipalidad de Guayaquil (@alcaldiagye) Los sospechosos fueron puestos a Ã³rdenes de las autoridades competentes. author: Gerardo GarcÃ­a
title: Delfina GÃ³mez destaca que el programa de Obras es resultado de austeridad y transparencia  | El Heraldo de MÃ©xico
text: La Gobernadora mexiquense, [ Delfina GÃ³mez Ãlvarez](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/mundo/2024/7/11/delfina-gomez-se-congratula-con-programa-de-mejoramiento-urbano-beneficiara-municipios-del-edomex-620030.html) destacÃ³ que el [Programa de Obra PÃºblica](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/10/obra-publica-2024-del-edomex-se-deriva-de-escuchar-la-gente-delfina-gomez-619805.html) que se implementa en este aÃ±o en el estado, es resultado de la austeridad y la transparencia en el uso de los recursos. Al iniciar las obras de infraestructura deportiva y vial en Tenango del Valle, RayÃ³n, San Antonio la Isla y Chapultepec, la mandataria seÃ±alÃ³ que en su administraciÃ³n se destinan recursos de manera transparente, lo que permite un desarrollo equitativo de la entidad y el bienestar de las y los mexiquenses. Sigue leyendo: [Delfina GÃ³mez alcanza 200 Mesas de CoordinaciÃ³n para la ConstrucciÃ³n de La Paz](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/9/delfina-gomez-alcanza-200-mesas-de-coordinacion-para-la-construccion-de-la-paz-619268.html) [Delfina GÃ³mez presenta la marca destino que promoverÃ¡ la identidad de Estado de MÃ©xico](https://heraldodemexico.com.mx/nacional/2024/7/6/delfina-gomez-presenta-la-marca-destino-que-promovera-la-identidad-de-estado-de-mexico-618573.html) En su gira de trabajo, la titular del Ejecutivo estatal dio banderazo de inicio a varios proyectos del Programa de Obra PÃºblica 2024 integrado por 125 propuestas y una inversiÃ³n total de mil 500 millones de pesos. â€œEsta medida de austeridad y manejar los recursos adecuadamente, nos ha permitido liberar recursos que ahora se destinan a la realizaciÃ³n de obra pÃºblica que beneficia directamente a nuestras comunidades, demostrando con hechos que el poder estÃ¡ al servicio del puebloâ€, dijo. Obras con vocaciÃ³n social y humanista TambiÃ©n explicÃ³ que las obras tienen vocaciÃ³n social y humanista, particularmente los trabajos de rehabilitaciÃ³n de parques y unidades deportivas, que permitirÃ¡n tener espacios, no solo para convivir, sino para practicar un deporte, fortalecer los valores y lograr la paz mental que hace falta como sociedad. Desde Tenango del Valle, agradeciÃ³ al gabinete estatal por trabajar con austeridad, pues dijo que una de las acciones realizadas desde el inicio de su gobierno fue la disminuciÃ³n de salarios en beneficio del pueblo mexiquense. Las obras que arrancaron serÃ¡n la rehabilitaciÃ³n del Parque Municipal en Tenango con una inversiÃ³n de 24.7 millones de pesos, en beneficio de 90 mil habitantes del municipio; ademÃ¡s, durante los trabajos de construcciÃ³n se generarÃ¡n 928 empleos directos e indirectos. TambiÃ©n se remodelarÃ¡ la cancha de futbol rÃ¡pido, la trotapista, el ciclopuerto, la ciclovÃ­a, el mÃ³dulo sanitario, el Ã¡rea de calistenia, la zona de patinaje y juegos infantiles, las Ã¡reas verdes y de mascotas; el teatro al aire libre, la construcciÃ³n de gradas nuevas y un estacionamiento para motocicletas. En RayÃ³n, se modernizarÃ¡ la Unidad Deportiva â€œDionicio CerÃ³nâ€ en beneficio de 47 mil personas. Se rehabilitarÃ¡ el pÃ³rtico de acceso, las canchas de frontenis, basquetbol y futbol; se construirÃ¡ un gimnasio al aire libre, un salÃ³n de yoga, y dos canchas de pÃ¡del. Mediante este proyecto se crearÃ¡n mil 820 empleos directos e indirectos. En San Antonio la Isla, se anunciÃ³ la pavimentaciÃ³n de la calle Francisco I. Madero con una inversiÃ³n de 14 millones de pesos para mÃ¡s de 46 mil personas. Finalmente en Chapultepec, se modernizarÃ¡ la Unidad Deportiva en la colonia del Campesino, con accesos, un estacionamiento, cuatro canchas de usos mÃºltiples; modernizaciÃ³n de la alberca, Ã¡rea de juegos infantiles, ejercitadores y andadores; la rehabilitaciÃ³n de las canchas de futbol rÃ¡pido, frontenis y trotapista en beneficio de 58 mil habitantes del municipio. En la GÃ³mez Ãlvarez estuvo acompaÃ±ada por deportistas e integrantes del gabinete estatal, ademÃ¡s de los alcaldes Roberto Bautista Arellano, de Tenango del Valle; Erick Cedillo Hinojosa, de RayÃ³n; Lizeth Marlene Sandoval Colindres, de San Antonio la Isla; y Laura Amalia GonzÃ¡lez MartÃ­nez, de Chapultepec. text: Câ€™est une affaire qui occupe particuliÃ¨rement la presse sud-africaine, tant elle est rÃ©vÃ©latrice des travers et tensions qui traversent le pays. [The Guardian est revenu sur cette affaire](https://www.theguardian.com/world/article/2024/aug/01/miss-south-africa-contestant-faces-backlash-over-nigerian-father) qui dÃ©chaÃ®ne les passions et a pris derniÃ¨rement une tournure politique. author: Coingape Staff
title: XRP Price Prediction: Expert Sees Potential Surge to $3.70
text: Ripple XRP coin is currently in the spotlight following an expertâ€™s analysis suggesting a potential surge in its value. Amid its ongoing consolidation phase, Ripple is showing signs that could lead to a significant increase in its price, possibly reaching $3.70. Currently [valued](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/xrp/) at $0.63, XRP is experiencing a consolidation phase along a slanted trend line. This pattern is reminiscent of previous cycles where the asset showed significant growth following similar trends. In 2021, XRP witnessed a 500% gain, reaching $1.60. This historical precedent and current market conditions form the basis of the expertâ€™s prediction for a potential surge. [#XRP]Super Guppy (Update) ðŸ” Latest Development Check: For a clearer picture, refer to the October 28, 2022 post: [https://t.co/WPLTtxRvov] What's Happening Now: [#XRP]is currently in a consolidation phase along a slanted trend line, reminiscent of cycle 'B'. The pattern mirrorsâ€¦ [pic.twitter.com/Uz3aHf4mR6] Recommended Articles â€” EGRAG CRYPTO (@egragcrypto) [December 26, 2023] Technical analysis retrieved from TradingView indicates a strong bullish market sentiment. The summary aligns with a â€˜strong buyâ€™ rating, supported by moving averages and oscillators. Rippleâ€™s trading volume has surged by 38%, now standing at $1.9 billion, further reinforcing the positive outlook. Additionally, the [appearance](https://twitter.com/egragcrypto/status/1585847672854175745) of a glowing green Super Guppy, a set of moving averages indicating trend strength, suggests a bullish trend for XRP. XRP Legal Clarity and Market Anticipation Following Rippleâ€™s partial victory in the case [against](https://coingape.com/xrp-lawsuit-ripple-legal-chief-us-sec-settlement/) the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), where XRP was declared not a security, market anticipation has grown. Despite this legal clarity, XRP has not yet seen a formidable rally in line with the general market movement. However, experts believe the asset is well-positioned for growth, especially when considering Rippleâ€™s underlying technology and increasing adoption rates. Ripple Price Prediction The expert, known under the pseudonym Egrag Crypto, suggests that the period between December 2023 and February 2024 could be critical for XRP. This timeframe is expected to witness significant price movements, offering potential opportunities for investors. The analysis advises consolidating dollars and other crypto gains into XRP during this phase, which could amplify portfolios by six to seven times. XRPâ€™s race to hit the $1 mark is also in context with competing assets like Cardano (ADA). Based on underlying factors and technical indicators it is considered to have a strong position in this race. The overall trajectory along with the [market](https://coingape.com/markets/xrp-price-prediction-simmers-at-0-64-can-december-uncork-festive-flow-towards-1/) trends and technology adoption rates, will be key determinants in its potential skyrocketing prospects. XRP/USD daily price chart, Source: [Tradingview](https://www.tradingview.com/x/EAv8su1G/) A look at the Rippleâ€™s technical analysis obtained from TradingView reveals that optimistic sentiments dominate, with the summary coinciding with a strong buyâ€™ at 13. Moving averages support the same rating of 11 and oscillators support a â€˜buyâ€™ at 2. The 20-EMA is currently above 50-EMA, indicating a bullish trend in the near term. author: Alexandra Bellusci
title: Leah Remini warned Jennifer Lopez about Ben Affleck pre-divorce
text:
This queen was somewhat uneasy about her best friendâ€™s king.
Sources told Page Six in May that Leah Remini reconnected with her former best friend Jennifer Lopez after news of the pop starâ€™s issues with Ben Affleck surfaced.
â€œThe King of Queensâ€ alum, 54, and the â€œOn the Floorâ€ singer, 55, originally had a falling out over Lopezâ€™s marriage to Affleck .
10 Leah Remini on â€œSo You Think You Can Dance.â€ FOX Image Collection via Getty Images 10 Angelo Pagan and Leah Remini attend the HollyRod 20th Annual DesignCare Gala at Cross Creek Farm on July 14, 2018, in Malibu, California. Getty Images for HollyRod Foundation According to the insider, Remini and Lopez got into a fight before the former coupleâ€™s 2022 wedding over Reminiâ€™s concerns about the â€œAirâ€ director.
Explore More Meghan Markle has 'regrets' about royal exit, her comments have 'backfired': expert Nikki Bella gushed over husband Artem Chigvintsev days before his domestic violence arrest Paramedics called to 'DWTS' pro Artem Chigvintsev's home for â€˜medical emergencyâ€™ before domestic violence arrest The â€œPeople Puzzlerâ€ host warned the artist to remember why she broke things off with Affleck during their relationship in the early aughts.
As for what those issues were? As the source put it, â€œBecause he is selfish and is not fully committed as a partner.â€
10 Leah Remini and Jennifer Lopez pose together on Instagram. leahremini/Instagram 10 Leah Remini and Jennifer Lopez on social media. leahremini/Instagram Meanwhile, a second source explained that Remini had wanted to reconnect with her former best friend for a while during their estrangement.
â€œThey were friends for years. She wants to reach out to her, but she canâ€™t just call up and say, â€˜I told you so,â€ the insider shared in May. â€œJ.Lo was so mad, she cut off all ties.â€
Now, Remini and Lopez can lean on one another, as Remini announced that she and husband Angelo PagÃ¡n have split after 21 years of marriage .
10 Leah Remini and Jennifer Lopez attend the â€œSecond Actâ€ World Premiere After Party at West Edge on December 12, 2018, in New York City. Getty Images 10 Jennifer Lopez and Leah Remini during â€œDancing with the Stars.â€ Disney General Entertainment Content via Getty Images The news comes just two weeks after Lopez filed for divorce without an attorney on the anniversary of her and Affleckâ€™s second wedding ceremony.
Lopez and Affleck tied the knot in July 2022 at the Little White Wedding Chapel in Las Vegas before saying â€œI doâ€ for a second time at Affleckâ€™s estate in Riceboro, Georgia, the following month, where Remini wasnâ€™t invited.
10 Jennifer Lopez and Leah Remini on â€œThe View.â€ Disney General Entertainment Content via Getty Images At the time, sources told TMZ that the actress was busy helping her daughter, Sofia, 20 , whom she shares with now-estranged husband PagÃ¡n, prepare to head off to college.
Remini and PagÃ¡n, 56, announced the news of their divorce in a joint Instagram statement Thursday.
â€œWell, here we are. After 28 years together and 21 years of marriage, we have decided to file for divorce. This decision came after a lot of thought and care, and as hard as divorce is, we are approaching this with a positive outlook because we know itâ€™s whatâ€™s best for us. We are proud of how we have worked through this together,â€ the statement read.
â€œYes, weâ€™re sad, and weâ€™ve got some figuring out to do as we continue to move forward into our new normal â€” together still in many ways, and apart in some new ones. But hereâ€™s the thing: weâ€™ve been best friends for so many years,â€ they continued. â€œWe are still celebrating holidays together, watching our favorite tv shows together, and gathering as a family.â€
10 Leah Remini and Jennifer Lopez on â€œWatch What Happens Live.â€ NBCU Photo Bank/NBCUniversal via Getty Images 10 Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez stop by Soho House in Los Angeles on May 19, 2024. Thecelebrityfinder/MEGA The pair also took a moment to explain the decision to separate.
â€œSo, the big questionâ€”why? To put it simply, we both changed, as people do, and we got used to playing roles that didnâ€™t fit us anymore,â€ the statement said.
â€œAfter a lot of effort and consideration, weâ€™ve decided to take this step, which reflects who we are today. Our bond is still strongâ€”itâ€™s just evolved into something different. We think a marriage that lasted this long and created so many beautiful memories, especially raising our incredible daughter, is something to celebrate,â€ they concluded. â€œFrom our perspective, this marriage was a huge success. And now, weâ€™re looking forward to creating even more cherished momentsâ€”just in a different way.â€
Remini and PagÃ¡n married in 2003 after meeting in 1996 at El Floridita, a Cuban club and restaurant in Los Angeles.
10 Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez pose together on the red carpet. Image Press Agency/NurPhoto/Shutterstock Meanwhile, Lopez is single after trying to make her romance with Affleck work for a second time.
The Hollywood icons started dating in 2002 and called off their initial engagement in 2004. Lopez and Affleck went on to have kids and marry Marc Anthony and Jennifer Garner, respectively, but ultimately rekindled their flame in 2021.
After splitting the first time around, the Grammy winner admitted she felt like she â€œwas going to dieâ€ and went into an 18-year â€œspiral.â€
But this time around, Affleckâ€™s proposal was completely different. The â€œBatmanâ€ actor engraved a special meaning into Lopezâ€™s engagement ring , which is estimated to be worth â€œwell over $5 million.â€
â€œThis one he put â€˜not.going.anywhereâ€™ because thatâ€™s how he would sign his emails when we started talking again,â€ she explained to Apple Music Oneâ€™s Zane Lowe in 2022 about her second engagement. â€œLike, â€˜Donâ€™t worry, Iâ€™m not going anywhere.â€™â€
